title: "Slides Redirect"

      "EDA3": "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXiVFaSsBIhlHjO_p1hXRefWfyRjFdsBXQVJslPyF_g/edit?slide=id.g3a1af70067d_2_11#slide=id.g3a1af70067d_2_11"
    },
    "EVL": {
      "EVL1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g3a19c455253_0_0#slide=id.g3a19c455253_0_0",
      "EVL2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g3b5862ed703_1_221#slide=id.g3b5862ed703_1_221",
      "EVL3":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g3b5862ed703_1_276#slide=id.g3b5862ed703_1_276"
    },
    "CLS": {
      "CLS1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1RRVDuUdmM3Ry_vuuTAm_XpIpSM4pxcjf0ROw63ROpdY/edit?slide=id.g3b61aae36eb_0_0#slide=id.g3b61aae36eb_0_0",

      "CLS3":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1RRVDuUdmM3Ry_vuuTAm_XpIpSM4pxcjf0ROw63ROpdY/edit?slide=id.g3b61aae36eb_0_357#slide=id.g3b61aae36eb_0_357"},
    "DATA": {
      "DATA1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1gFR-NVjAKTWZO9t0PB6QDNMvSfccvEGwuCWNnLiQyno/edit?slide=id.g3b71ec61ad4_0_0#slide=id.g3b71ec61ad4_0_0",
      "DATA2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1gFR-NVjAKTWZO9t0PB6QDNMvSfccvEGwuCWNnLiQyno/edit?slide=id.g3b71ec61ad4_0_170#slide=id.g3b71ec61ad4_0_170"
      },
    "MOD": {
      "TREE1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1FuZ1fhOdXQR3mXYMnqJs3TynPwnir6xgROqTJchCGrE/edit?slide=id.g3ba82aea71e_0_0#slide=id.g3ba82aea71e_0_0",
      "TREE2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1FuZ1fhOdXQR3mXYMnqJs3TynPwnir6xgROqTJchCGrE/edit?slide=id.g3ba82aea71e_0_125#slide=id.g3ba82aea71e_0_125",
      "TREE3" : "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1FuZ1fhOdXQR3mXYMnqJs3TynPwnir6xgROqTJchCGrE/edit?slide=id.g3ba82aea71e_0_135#slide=id.g3ba82aea71e_0_135",
      "KNN":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1RP2FR1aiXoo8UT0EY6Y5e9SddCAjbZVBjGNcrzfP32Y/edit?slide=id.g392c6cfdf37_0_0#slide=id.g392c6cfdf37_0_0",
      "LIN1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/19LLF9z-B4KLSVsrIF3QgnEHM70GveCzwWW-h374A0R0/edit?slide=id.g3b918ed6968_0_0#slide=id.g3b918ed6968_0_0",
      "LIN2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/19LLF9z-B4KLSVsrIF3QgnEHM70GveCzwWW-h374A0R0/edit?slide=id.g3b918ed6968_0_50#slide=id.g3b918ed6968_0_50",
      "SVM":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1RP2FR1aiXoo8UT0EY6Y5e9SddCAjbZVBjGNcrzfP32Y/edit?slide=id.g3bb113f723d_0_0#slide=id.g3bb113f723d_0_0"},
    "ESB": {
      "ESB1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/167bEdnUICILTGqOoLvAocNPyuPo7-0Tt89SZDA8_PEE/edit?slide=id.g3bb194b7a29_0_0#slide=id.g3bb194b7a29_0_0",
      "ESB2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/167bEdnUICILTGqOoLvAocNPyuPo7-0Tt89SZDA8_PEE/edit?slide=id.g3bb194b7a29_0_50#slide=id.g3bb194b7a29_0_50",
      "ESB3":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/167bEdnUICILTGqOoLvAocNPyuPo7-0Tt89SZDA8_PEE/edit?slide=id.g3bb249c1001_0_277#slide=id.g3bb249c1001_0_277"},
    "NN": {
      "NN1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1FbfagJuRHVHG7OSMIGvUJNC80RvmNFG-9LUtLGY4gxw/edit?slide=id.g3bbf0497fa0_0_3#slide=id.g3bbf0497fa0_0_3",
      "NN2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1FbfagJuRHVHG7OSMIGvUJNC80RvmNFG-9LUtLGY4gxw/edit?slide=id.g3bbf0497fa0_0_53#slide=id.g3bbf0497fa0_0_53",
      "NN3":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1FbfagJuRHVHG7OSMIGvUJNC80RvmNFG-9LUtLGY4gxw/edit?slide=id.g3bbf0497fa0_0_58#slide=id.g3bbf0497fa0_0_58"},
    "STORY:" : {
      "STORY" : ""
    },
    "DL": {"DL1":"","DL2":"","DL3":""}
  };

  // Flatten slides for redirect lookup
  const slidesFlat = {};
  for (const topic in slidesByTopic) {
    Object.assign(slidesFlat, slidesByTopic[topic]);
  }

  // Read ?q= parameter
  const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const target = params.get("q");

  if (target && slidesFlat[target]) {
    // Redirect if valid
    window.location.replace(slidesFlat[target]);
  } else {
    // Build HTML for grouped topics
    document.write("<h2>Select a slide deck:</h2>");
    for (const topic in slidesByTopic) {
      document.write(`<div style="border:1px solid #ccc; padding:10px; margin:10px 0; border-radius:6px;">`);
      document.write(`<h3>${topic} Slides</h3>`);
      for (const key in slidesByTopic[topic]) {
        const url = slidesByTopic[topic][key];
        if (url) {
          document.write(`<a href="?q=${key}" style="display:inline-block; margin:4px; padding:6px 12px; background-color:#e0e0e0; border-radius:4px; text-decoration:none;">${key}</a>`);
        } else {
          document.write(`<span style="display:inline-block; margin:4px; padding:6px 12px; background-color:#f0f0f0; border-radius:4px; color:#888;">${key}</span>`);
        }
      }
      document.write("</div>");
    }
  }
</script>
